release.action: Changed from wait/notify synchronization to Java 1.5 CountDownLatch.
Refactored the work manager. There is now better monitoring of background tasks.

The configuration file is now called "legstar-engine-config.xml" by default. It is a combination of "legstar-pooling-config.xml" which contain the engine pooling parameters and the "legstar-invoker-config.xml" which is shared wih the invoker.
First version of the Connection Pooling Engine.
